## PipelineContext interface

Represents the context in which a pipeline operates.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PipelineContext 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [abortController](./pipeline.pipelinecontext.abortcontroller.md) |  | AbortController | An abort controller to signal and handle aborting pipeline operations. |
|  [emitter](./pipeline.pipelinecontext.emitter.md) |  | [EventEmitter](./pipeline.eventemitter.md) | An event emitter for the pipeline to emit and listen to custom events. |
|  [stepParams](./pipeline.pipelinecontext.stepparams.md) |  | Record&lt;string, any&gt; | A record of parameters for the steps in the pipeline. |
|  [stepResults](./pipeline.pipelinecontext.stepresults.md) |  | Record&lt;string, any&gt; | A record of results from previously executed steps in the pipeline. |
